commit.message:
trans-array.c (gfc_conv_expr_descriptor): Add out-of-the-scalarizer cobounds evaluation.

	* trans-array.c (gfc_conv_expr_descriptor): Add out-of-the-scalarizer
	cobounds evaluation.
